## Take a look at my sleep time last month

### Solution

``` {r}
set.seed(5)
# Data creation
aug_date <- seq.Date(Sys.Date()-31, by='day', length.out = 31)
sleep_time <- round(rnorm(31, mean=7, sd=2))
df <- data.frame(Dates = aug_date, sleep_time= sleep_time)


# What date did I sleep most
most_sleeping_date = df$Dates[df$sleep_time==max(df$sleep_time)]

# Plot my sleeping through date
library(ggplot2)
plot1 <- ggplot(df, aes(Dates, sleep_time)) + geom_line() + geom_point()

```
